title: Cant get into the loading screen after the new patch updated.
body: I cant get into the loading screen after I updated. Everything else was normal but after the champ selection my laptop went into dark screen and couldn't load the game. I tried to restart my laptop but it was still not working. I lost a rank game because of this, and I think I deserve a loss forgiven.

replies.body: The black screen you're reporting is can happen when your network is failing to connect to the game servers.  We can't alter game stats, and it's important to make sure your connection can hold constant communication to play League.  Go through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a solution.  Let me know if you have any questions!
